LanguageData.BulletCasingVelocityFactor: Factor at which the casings fly away
LanguageData.BulletCasingUseWeaponRotation: Use weapon rotation to determine casing direction
LanguageData.BulletCasingUseWeaponRotationTooltip: If on the casings will fly depending on the rotation of the pawn and where he/she is aiming (like top-down view). If off the casings will always fly to the right side and down (like side view).
